nodes.documentation:
Letters must be purchased in 10x10 pixel blocks.
 Each coordinate represents 10 pixels. That is,
   _x=5, _y=10, _width=3, _height=3
 Represents a 30x30 pixel letter at coordinates (50, 100)
nodes.name: buy
